channel.title: Is it just me?
channel.description: ..or does many of you read those stories, which build the quest? On RS forums there's new background story for last dwarf quest, whic I think personally was awesome. So yeah.. Am I only one around here to read them?

item.title: Is it just me?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:8, topic:531897”]any quest is fun as long as it’s not one small favour or recipe for disaster subquests[/quote]I actually liked OSF it taught me a lot about the RS map.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it just me?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Elrick, post:6, topic:531897”]Actually, Shilo Village was a great quest imo. It incorporated legitimate cultural aspects to the game by using reituals, myths, spirits, and such to make the story feel as legitimate as the rest of the world. It wasn’t just a fetch quest as much as it was going on an adventure.[/quote]Yeah Shilo was pretty cool, took forever, but cool

Read full topic

item.title: Is it just me?
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Actually, Shilo Village was a great quest imo. It incorporated legitimate cultural aspects to the game by using reituals, myths, spirits, and such to make the story feel as legitimate as the rest of the world. It wasn’t just a fetch quest as much as it was going on an adventure.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it just me?
item.dc:creator: @Techkid Techkid
item.description:
@Techkid wrote:

[quote=“CoderOops, post:1, topic:531897”]…or does many of you read those stories, which build the quest?
On RS forums there’s new background story for last dwarf quest, whic I think personally was awesome.
So yeah… Am I only one around here to read them?[/quote]
i might

Read full topic

item.title: Is it just me?
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:3, topic:531897”][quote author=Elrick link=topic=650684.msg4367398#msg4367398 date=1379937731]

…or does many of you read those stories, which build the quest?
On RS forums there’s new background story for last dwarf quest, whic I think personally was awesome.
So yeah… Am I only one around here to read them?

I do not normally read background stories, or pay attention to the dialogue much, but the mahjarrat (SP?) quests seemed pretty darn interesting.
[/quote]
They put a lot of thought into the quests and the story lines, which is why you should do them. If you’re into the lore of them, you will absolutely love the quests. I am a big fan of the Mahjarrat/God/Dragonkin quest line. If you want to read more about the story lines, you can easily go onto the RuneScape Wikia and read about them.[/quote]

I personally fell in love with cave goblin series. <3
also dwarf is awesome, since they started to write stories on forums. (:
I guess mahjarrat is the longest game quest line? So many branches at least knotted together.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it just me?
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Elrick, post:2, topic:531897”][quote author=CoderOops link=topic=650684.msg4366967#msg4366967 date=1379864533]
…or does many of you read those stories, which build the quest?
On RS forums there’s new background story for last dwarf quest, whic I think personally was awesome.
So yeah… Am I only one around here to read them?
[/quote]
I do not normally read background stories, or pay attention to the dialogue much, but the mahjarrat (SP?) quests seemed pretty darn interesting.[/quote]
They put a lot of thought into the quests and the story lines, which is why you should do them. If you’re into the lore of them, you will absolutely love the quests. I am a big fan of the Mahjarrat/God/Dragonkin quest line. If you want to read more about the story lines, you can easily go onto the RuneScape Wikia and read about them.

Read full topic
